name: LynxSuperFederation
description: A Lynx that manages a group that puts the federation first.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer

JOIN_LOGGER.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling.

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event Logs Channel to note down important bt level events, recommend to make this Public. ex: '-100'

ERROR_LOGS.description: Error Logs Channel to note down important Bt errors events, make this Public/Private. ex: '-100'

TGB_TOKEN.description: Go to Telegram and Take bt token at @BotFather

TGB_USERNAME.description: Fill ur Bt Username which from @BotFather

DEV_ID.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bt (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Masha support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours

SD_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as SUDO Users

SUPPORT_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as SUPPORT Users(GBAN Perms Only)

TIGERS_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as TIGER Users

WHITELIST_ID.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as WHITELISTED - can't be banned with ur bt

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your HEROKU Api Key, get from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'
HEROKU_API_KEY.value: Check On Your Heroku Dashboard -> Settings

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your Postgres SQl Database, empty this field if you dont have one

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where your users will go and bother you with shit But be like: MyGroupChatUsernameBlah. If this ever points to masha support than consider you made an enemy.

ARQ_API.description: Go to Telegram and Get this from @ARQRobot

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

NO_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

BLACKLIST_CHATS.description: List of chats you want blacklisted.

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Go to Telegram and Get one from @SpamWatchBot

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Environment variables. Leave it as it is

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: LSFederation .if you need custom deploy then type your git repo link

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks. If you dont know how this works leave it as it is

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks. Better leave this as it is on heroku
